long_description: The Swix W1 Advanced ski poles feature carbon-fiber shafts for responsive, lightweight performance. Carbon-fiber composite shafts have superb swing weight to aid in planting your poles exactly where you want them. Straps comfortably position your hands for better power transmission and control. Grips are designed to fit easily in your hands. Baskets work best for packed snow; basket color matches the color of the graphics. Shaft diameter measures 13mm at the handle and 10mm at the basket.
short_description: The Swix W1 Advanced ski poles feature carbon-fiber shafts for responsive, lightweight performance.
